title: Notes App -- Full-stack Mobile Application
shortDescription: A full-stack cloud-connected notes application with real-time updates and secure CRUD operations. Built with Kotlin (Jetpack Compose), Spring Boot, MongoDB Atlas, Retrofit, Railway. Features REST APIs, sorting, copy-to-clipboard, dialogs, contextual menus, and cloud deployment.
detailedDescription:
Built a `production-ready` `full-stack` notes application that demonstrates `end-to-end` mobile and backend development. The app connects Android clients to a `cloud-hosted` `Spring Boot` backend with `MongoDB Atlas` for persistent storage, enabling `real-time CRUD operations` with secure API communication. Designed to showcase `scalable architecture` patterns, clean UI/UX principles, and modern `deployment practices`.

üö© **What problem it solves**
Demonstrates complete `full-stack mobile development` workflow:
- Seamless `client-server communication` with REST APIs
- `Cloud-based` data persistence and synchronization
- Real-time updates across devices
- `Scalable backend architecture` with environment-based configuration
- Modern Android development practices with `Jetpack Compose`
- `Production-grade` deployment and security patterns

üõ†Ô∏è **My Contributions**
- `Architected and developed` the complete `full-stack` application (Android client + backend + database)
- Built `RESTful backend` using `Spring Boot` with proper `MVC separation` and service layers
- Integrated `MongoDB Atlas` for `cloud-based NoSQL storage` with document modeling
- `Designed and implemented` REST API endpoints for full `CRUD operations` (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
- Developed Android client using `Jetpack Compose` with `Material Design 3` principles
- Implemented `Retrofit` HTTP client for `type-safe API` communication with proper `error handling`
- Created advanced sorting functionality: Newest First, Oldest First, A-Z, Z-A with `persistent state`
- Built user-focused features: copy-to-clipboard, confirmation dialogs, contextual action menus
- Implemented `scroll-state restoration` to preserve UI position across configuration changes
- Designed `FloatingActionButton (FAB)` with intuitive action triggers
- `Deployed backend` on `Railway` platform with `environment variable security`
- Configured `cloud scaling` and `continuous deployment` pipeline
- Applied `MVVM architecture` with `repository pattern` for clean `separation of concerns`

‚öôÔ∏è **Technical Highlights**
**Backend Architecture (Spring Boot):**
- `RESTful API design` with proper HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- `Service layer abstraction` for business logic separation
- `MongoDB Atlas` integration with `Spring Data MongoDB`
- `Environment-variable-based configuration` for security (no hardcoded credentials)
- `CORS configuration` for secure cross-origin requests
- JSON request/response handling with automatic serialization

**Android Client (Jetpack Compose):**
- `Declarative UI` with composable functions and `state management`
- `Retrofit 2` integration for HTTP networking with `Gson` converter
- `Repository pattern` for data layer abstraction
- `ViewModel` integration for `lifecycle-aware` state handling
- `LazyColumn` with efficient scroll state preservation
- Custom sorting logic with persistent sort preferences
- Contextual action menus with long-press detection
- `Material 3 theming` with dynamic color support

**User Experience Features:**
- Multiple sort options (chronological and alphabetical)
- Copy-to-clipboard functionality for quick text sharing
- Confirmation dialogs for destructive actions (delete notes)
- Contextual menus for note-specific actions
- FAB with smooth animations and intuitive placement
- Smooth scroll restoration preserving user position
- `Loading states` and `error handling` with user feedback

**Deployment & DevOps:**
- `Railway platform` deployment with `automatic scaling`
- `Environment variable management` for secure credential storage
- `MongoDB Atlas` cloud database with `connection pooling`
- `CI/CD pipeline` integration for `continuous deployment`
- `Production-ready` error logging and monitoring

üìà **Impact**
- Demonstrates `full-stack mobile development` proficiency from UI to database
- Showcases modern Android development with `Jetpack Compose`
- Proves ability to `architect, build, and deploy` `production-grade` applications
- Highlights understanding of `REST API design` and `backend development`
- Demonstrates `cloud deployment` and `DevOps` practices
- Shows attention to UX with thoughtful features (sorting, confirmations, clipboard)
- Clean, `maintainable codebase` following `industry best practices`
